verses.verse: To the chief musician. Do not destroy. A secret treasure of David. Will you indeed speak righteousness in silence? Do you judge rightly, O sons of men?
Yes, in heart you work injustices you weigh the violence of your hands in the land.
The wicked ones are estranged from the womb; they go astray from the belly, speaking lies.
Their poison is like the poison of a serpent; like the deaf adder he stops his ear,
which will not hear the charmer's voice, skillful charmer of charms.
O God, break their teeth in their mouth; break out the big teeth of the young lions, O Jehovah.
They flow away like waters going away for themselves; he treads his arrows, as though they were cut off;
As a snail goes into melting, a miscarriage of a woman, they do not see the sun.
Before your pots can discern the thorns, whether green or glowing, He shall storm it away.
The righteous one shall rejoice when he sees vengeance; he shall wash his feet in the blood of the wicked ones.
And man will say, Truly, a fruit is to the righteous one; there is a God judging in the earth.
